Description: Overall sense of presence and realism in the virtual environment
Example Quote: The lighting and spatial sound immediately make it feel immersive.

Description: Participant feedback on ambient and directional light contributing to immersion
Example Quote: The lighting makes the space feel alive, not flat.

Description: Comments on how 3D or directional audio enhances experience
Example Quote: The spatial sound makes me feel surrounded by the environment.

Description: Reactions to visual and auditory realism
Example Quote: It feels like I’m really in a museum.

Description: All comments about movement
Example Quote: teleportation
column6: Teleportation is smooth, but I’d like a quick preview of where I’ll land.

Description: Observations about the teleport tool’s usability and visual indicators
Example Quote: The fade helps, but maybe a clearer arrow would help directionally.

Description: Issues or comfort with user direction and awareness after teleporting
Example Quote: I wish there was a compass or arrow showing my direction.

Description: Feedback on transitions between virtual scenes
Example Quote: It fades nicely, but I’d like a preview of where I’m going.

Description: Feedback on menus
Example Quote: icons
column6: The icons are intuitive but slightly small.

Description: Participant reactions to clarity
Example Quote: size
column6: The icons are intuitive but I had to lean closer to see them.

Description: Preferences for where and how menus appear in 3D space
Example Quote: I prefer when menus curve around my view instead of staying flat.

Description: Understanding and ease of gesture-based commands
Example Quote: I wasn’t sure which gesture activates the floating panels.

Description: Feedback on how participants engage with virtual objects and the tactile experience
Example Quote: Picking up artifacts feels satisfying.

Description: Ease and responsiveness of grabbing or holding objects
Example Quote: Picking up artifacts feels satisfying.

Description: Expectations or reactions to vibration or tactile feedback
Example Quote: I expected some haptic feedback when I grabbed something.

Description: Enjoyment or emotional response to interactions
Example Quote: It’s really satisfying to interact with the objects naturally.

Description: Technical stability
Example Quote: responsiveness
column6: No lag, though the ambient sound loop is a little short.

Description: Comments on performance speed or latency
Example Quote: No lag throughout the experience.

Description: Awareness of repetitive or short ambient sound loops
Example Quote: The ambient sound loop is a little short—I noticed repetition.

Description: Perceived smoothness and technical reliability
Example Quote: Everything ran smoothly without freezing.

Description: Overall perceived usability and learning curve
Example Quote: Pretty intuitive overall.

Description: How naturally users understand controls and system feedback
Example Quote: The system feels easy to pick up even without instructions.

Description: Requests for tutorials or onboarding aids
Example Quote: Maybe add a tutorial overlay at first launch.

Description: Clarity of visual or auditory cues when performing actions
Example Quote: I’d tweak interaction cues so it’s clearer when something’s selected.

Description: Physical and ergonomic comfort during VR use
Example Quote: No motion sickness, but menus could be closer to my eye level.

Description: Reports of nausea or disorientation
Example Quote: No motion sickness, everything felt stable.

Description: Fit
Example Quote: posture
column6: Menus too low, I had to tilt my head a lot.

Description: Duration or fatigue concerns
Example Quote: After a few minutes I felt the headset getting warm.

Description: Comments about look
Example Quote: feel
column5: and artistic presentation of the environment
column6: The floating panels look futuristic and elegant.

Description: Impressions of color schemes and tone
Example Quote: Colors are calm and help me focus.

Description: Reactions to spatial composition of scenes
Example Quote: The lobby layout feels balanced and inviting.

Description: All ideas for new features or refinements
Example Quote: I’d add clearer arrows and a short tutorial.

Description: Requests for onboarding help or tooltips
Example Quote: A quick tutorial at launch would help.

Description: Suggestions for improved affordances or feedback
Example Quote: Make object highlights more visible before grabbing.

Description: Requests for better or longer soundscapes
Example Quote: Extend ambient sound loops to reduce repetition.

Description: Suggestions for improved on-screen hints
Example Quote: A visual arrow for teleport direction would help.

Description: General user reflections and summaries of their experience
Example Quote: Pretty intuitive overall. Immersive and easy to navigate.

Description: Statements of fun
Example Quote: satisfaction
column6: It was fun exploring the artifacts.

Description: Participant trust in controls and environment
Example Quote: I feel confident using this without instructions.

Description: Participant ideas for iterative design improvements
Example Quote: I’d just tweak some cues and maybe add a tutorial overlay.
